Pre-Game Insights: The Kings are 11-14 against Western Conference opponents.
The Grizzlies are 10-8 in Western Conference play.
The Kings average 11.8 made 3-pointers per game this season, 1.3 fewer makes per game than the Grizzlies give up (13.1).
The Grizzlies score 9.7 more points per game (123.2) than the Kings give up (113.5).
Miscellaneous Highlights: Memphis plays Sacramento in Western Conference action Friday.
Sacramento is ninth in the Western Conference in rebounding averaging 43.9 rebounds.
Domantas Sabonis leads the Kings with 13.8 boards.
De'Aaron Fox is shooting 49.2% and averaging 26.8 points for the Kings.
Desmond Bane is scoring 16.3 points per game and averaging 5.9 rebounds for the Grizzlies.
The Kings are 4-6 in their last 10 games, averaging 113.3 points, 45.7 rebounds, 27.1 assists, 8.1 steals and 4.1 blocks per game while shooting 46.0% from the field.
The Grizzlies are 7-3 in their last 10 games, averaging 127.7 points, 50.8 rebounds, 31.4 assists, 9.9 steals and 5.5 blocks per game while shooting 47.0% from the field.
The Kings have several injuries: Keegan Murray (ankle), Devin Carter (shoulder).

The Grizzlies have several injuries: Zach Edey (concussion), Marcus Smart (finger), Brandon Clarke (knee), Santi Aldama (ankle), Yuki Kawamura (shoulder), Vince Williams Jr. (ankle), Ja Morant (ac joint), GG Jackson II (foot), Jake LaRavia (ankle)
